reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 68/04: DEADLINE FOR BY-LAW ADOPTING OPTIONAL CLASSES FOR 2004 TAXATION YEAR
reg_info.reg_name_text: DEADLINE FOR BY-LAW ADOPTING OPTIONAL CLASSES FOR 2004 TAXATION YEAR
reg_info.act_under: Assessment Act   Loi sur l’évaluation foncière

content.content: 1. For the 2004 taxation year, July 30, 2004 is prescribed as the later deadline for the purposes of clause 2 (3.2) (e) of the Act. O. Reg. 68/04, s. 1; O. Reg. 158/04, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. For the 2004 taxation year, July 30, 2004 is prescribed as the later deadline for the purposes of clause 2 (3.2) (e) of the Act. O. Reg. 68/04, s. 1; O. Reg. 158/04, s. 1.
